Hi all,

I have used NEAT to build a board player. Now after thousands of
generations I have a champion chromosom but I don't know how to use that
champion in ANJI so one can play against it to see is she a real
champion or not. If anyone can direct me how to use my champion and play
against it, I would highly appreciate it.

Ramin
